customer_reviews.title: ABN Portable 16 LED Safety Flare Signal Light with 9 Warning Light Modes 3-Pack
customer_reviews.text: I am 78 years old and my car is 7 years old and I travel a lot. I have not used the ABN portable LED flares yet, but I feel relieved to have them in my car in case I would have a break down. The bright orange flare lights have 9 modes of flashes and can be seen from a long distance so that others drivers realize there is a broken down car and have time to move over. The flares have a magnet on the back to attach to the car or they can be place on the road . They come with batteries installed.
customer_reviews.author: Regina E. Fink

customer_reviews.title: Great LED flare but no flashlight function.
customer_reviews.text: This LED road flare has four more flashing lights (16) compared to other LED road flares that have 12 LED light. In side by side comparisons, the ABN road flare was brighter than the 12 LED road flares. Also, I really light the color (dark orange) and the "rubbery" feel to this style of road flare. My other reservation about this product is that there is no flashlight mode. The small outside loop can be used to attach the road flare to a backpack as a safety beacon when walking at night.
customer_reviews.author: K.M.

customer_reviews.title: they are great. They are bright
customer_reviews.text: Bought these LED safety lights for my teenage son. He is a new driver and we live in a rural community that lacks steet lights on many of our roads. Although he hasn’t had to use them yet, they are great. They are bright, and easy to adjust and switch to different emergency signals. The fact that the lights are magnetic is also wonderful. The magnet is strong and stuck to the car securely. My husband plans to take one on the boat with him on his fishing trip this spring. These are a great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Papadopoulos

customer_reviews.title: Excellent beacon
customer_reviews.text: I frequently respond directly to a house for an ambulance call. I drop one of these at the end of the driveway so the ambulance can find it easier (not everyone has good address markers). Several of the drivers have told me the beacon is very easy to see from a distance and they appreciate having the driveway marked.
customer_reviews.author: Dan D.

product_meta.title: ABN Portable 16 LED Safety Flare Signal Light with 9 Warning Light Modes 3-Pack in Red for Roadside or Marine Emergency
feature_bullets: Practical: Use the ABN Portable 16 LED Safety Flare Signal Light 3-Pack with 9 Warning Light Modes in Red for Roadside or Marine Emergency for any kind of emergency situation as a hazard warning to other motorists when your car breaks down and you are stranded in the dark; Use as emergency beacon, marine applications, camping, and other outdoor activities

Modes: 9 warning light modes including spotlight, double blink, double pulse, single blink, rotate, SOS rescue (Morse code), alternate, solid-on high, and solid-on low; Each single press of the power button will change one red flash mode; Turn off by holding power button
Long Life: Up to 150 hours of use on one set of batteries (2 AAA batteries are required)
Magnetic and Hangable: Strong magnets on back allow attachment to metallic surfaces; Loop at the top of light allows for hanging from a hood latch, tent, tree branch, and more

Specifications: Approximate 3.75” x 1” (9.5cm x 2.5cm) dimensions; Turn on/off at any time with easy-to-use power button; Surrounding waterproof lids are held firmly with two bolts; Compact design; LED light visible for long distance
